title: Rebuild and publish a new draft deployment

requirements.text: Create and publish a new draft deployment for the current Maintenance Hub codebase so the user can access a fresh, non-expired draft environment.

quotes: ‚è∞ Your draft app has expired. Do you want to rebuild it?

acceptanceCriteria: A new draft build is generated from the current repository state.
The draft environment is accessible via a fresh draft URL and is not marked as expired at time of delivery.
No application functionality changes are introduced as part of this draft rebuild.

constraints: Do not change application features or UI behavior; this request is only to rebuild/publish a draft deployment.
nonGoals: Fixing dropdown visibility issues or any other UI/feature bugs unless explicitly requested separately.
Adding new features, pages, or backend schema changes.
